data.title: West Virginia University
data.text:
Matthew Perry stars as a former high-school basketball star who is miraculously transformed back into a teenager. Back in high school, Mike sacrificed everything to stay by his expectant girlfriend. Two decades later, he gets a second shot at stardom. Starring: Zac Efron, Matthew Perry, Leslie Mann, Thomas Lennon, Sterling Knight, Michelle Trachtenberg

Watch the trailer.

Rated PG-13

Runtime = 102 minutes
